TypeScript Parse Date String (Manual)

Descripción

Parse date string manually (dd/MM/yyyy or MM/dd/yyyy)


File Template: ❌


Prefix

date:parse:manual


Scopes

typescript


Snippet de código

const [${1:a}, ${2:b}, ${3:year}]: number[] = ${4:dateString}.split(/[\/\-]/).map(Number);
const ${5:date}: Date = new Date(${6|year,year|}, ${7|b-1,a-1|}, ${8|a,b|});
